title: Rainy city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A white van drives slowly on a rainy city street with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 0.7 m/s). There are 22 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The white van is driving slowly on a rainy city street. There are several other cars on the road, including a blue car and a parked white truck. The road is wet and visibility is reduced due to the rain. There are traffic lights and street signs visible in the background.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly due to the rainy weather conditions. The ego vehicle is maintaining a safe distance from the other vehicles to avoid any potential accidents.
